head.supplied: ¶ [To Baron F. Von Mueller, Melbourne, No. 785, dated 31st August 1883. Acknowledges receipt of certain publications forwarded by him, and states that the Superintendent of Government Printing has be...

div.p: From an official of the Indian Government
British Library, India Office Records and Private Papers, proceedings, Agriculture and Horticulture: Agriculture, IOR/P/2055, pp. 77-8.

Letter not found. Entry is a register entry only, recording the transmission of the letter. M had requested copies of the volume in M to an official of the Indian Government, 15 July 1883 (in this edition as 83-07-15a).
[To Baron F. Von Mueller, Melbourne, No. 785, dated 31st August 1883. Acknowledges receipt of certain publications forwarded by him, and states that the Superintendent of Government Printing has been instructed to supply him with three copies of 'Select Extra-Tropical plants.'
B80.13.07. The proceedings note that, on 31 August, a copy of this letter, numbered as No. 786, was forwarded to the Superintendent of Government Printing 'for compliance'. ]
